name: Planeta Lem, "Abre la boca"
description:
Personal and danceable, it feeds on rock, reggae, pop, hip hop etc.

This is their third Incarnation after two albums as Go LEM! (Paraíso, 2000, and Infierno, 2001) and two as Go Lem System (Viaje, 2003, and Cacería, 2006, which has colaboration of Manu Chao and Gambeat, of Radio Bemba). Now they are presenting their new album, Abre la boca, as PLANETA LEM.

This cd contains 12 own songs in spanish and also english, french and catalan.
